soffico.customerapi.util

Class DeprecationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • soffico.customerapi.util.DeprecationHandler

  • public class DeprecationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to send a deprecation signal whenever customer API functions are used that will be refactored in the future. Currently the deprecation signal is logged to the log files and to the system events An internal cache is implemented that per function only one signal is sent
